Transcript: Hi, this is Marilyn Churley calling to invite you to a very exciting event. On Sunday, February 15th, Jack Layton will be nominated as our federal candidate in Toronto Danforth. It begins at five PM at the Opera House at 735 Queen Street East. We also plan to canvass every household in the riding, earlier in the day. For more information, call 4165915455 extension 233. Hope to see you there.
